file_content.text: There can be no survivors. They will not escape their fate.
No witnesses. [Kill the refugees]
Stay back. Stay back!
I heard rumors the Imps were on Makeb. But this is not about the war--we're just getting civilians offworld.
You're in no position to argue, Captain. You have three engineers traveling with you; bring them out.
Give me what I want.
The Hutts are enough enemy for both of us. There are three engineers traveling with you--I want to talk to them.
I'm not looking for a fight.
I'm not sure I can do that.
It's okay, Captain.
Three of you are engineers from the government mining committee. Step forward, or I start by killing this man.
Come out, engineers, or else!
Your engineers died in the fighting. You can kill me, but it won't make a difference.
It's alright, Captain. You're worth more than we are, anyway.
If you want us to mine for you, you're a little late. Word is, the planet's core is unstable; whole place is coming apart.
The Empire requires your services. Follow me.
Your expertise is needed.
The Dark Council requires your knowledge. Serve at my side, and you will be duly rewarded.
I offer a privileged position.
There's more going on than you realize, and the Empire requires your assistance. You need to come with me.
Your expertise is needed.
Pack your things. My employers will tell you the details somewhere safe.
I've been hired to find you.
Then you understand that Makeb is doomed. Have you seen the research?
You know about the core?
The Republic sent the data around a little while ago. It's the only reason I'm leaving home.
That's enough.
You will speak only when I permit it. From now on, you are a slave and nothing more.
If you want to live, obey.
I don't think so.
These people are under my protection. I won't let you kidnap them.
You have no choice.
Interfere and you die. [Attack]
What if they want to come, Captain?
This is a chance to do good.
I'm offering a chance to stabilize the core and save Makeb. Are you with me?
I think... you'd better get moving to the evac site. We'll be okay.
Are you sure?
Pretty sure.
I heard what happened. We'll send someone to pick up your recruits.
See you back at the mining platform. We're almost ready to start.
Dead. All of them....
Only our Republic escort. So far.
You wanted us; we surrender. You can afford to let everyone else escape the planet.
Support team? Get someone who can bring these vehicles online. I want the civilians out of harm's way.
We can be merciful, true.
Support team? We're done here.
I'll send a few men to pick up your recruits. I... don't imagine they'll cause trouble.
When you're ready, meet us back on the mining platform. Science squad is about done prepping; time to save the planet.
Thank you.
Acknowledged. I'll... see who we can spare.
Team is on the way. They can escort your recruits as well.
